A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney has done to Star Wars what Anakin did to the Jedi temple at the end of episode 3 - burned it to the ground.

What was once a vast universe of diverse characters\, races\, species\, technology\, stories and relationships has become so very soulless\, even passionless.  Star Wars: The Last Jedi is\, at the very least\, accurate in name only - the Star Wars universe without it's most meaningful protagonists.  And it doesn't appear they will be coming back ever again.

For any true Star Wars fans\, this film will break your heart.
